text: Hi guys please could someone help me, I’ve just set up a new project, the initial `hs upload`  worked a treat uploaded all my new theme to the correct place in HS so I know have the correct access, but `hs watch my-website-theme my-website-theme` runs but when i save a file it doesn’t see that and upload it

I don’t have personal experience with this, but based on that error, it sounds like an authentication issue. I would suggest double-checking that you’re using the correct access token, and make sure your private app (and its associated owner) have the necessary permissions.

Hi All,

I'm working with tailwind wich is going alright so far, but im kinda stuck on getting the drag and drop to work.
I have tried to use the cms boilerplate layout css code but tailwind doesn't reconize the jinja in the css file.
How can add the drag and drop while stil using tailwind ?

im using this folder to work with tailwind
<https://github.com/ozguruysal/HubSpot-tailwind>
